verses.verse: Maschil <S%H4905><s%> <S%H8688><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>; A Prayer <S%H8605><s%> when he was in the cave <S%H4631><s%>. I cried <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> with my voice <S%H6963><s%>; with my voice <S%H6963><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> did I make my supplication <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8691><s%>.
I poured out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my complaint <S%H7879><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him; I shewed <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him my trouble <S%H6869><s%>.

When my spirit <S%H7307><s%> was overwhelmed <S%H5848><s%> <S%H8692><s%> within me, then thou knewest <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my path <S%H5410><s%>. In the way <S%H734><s%> wherein <S%H2098><s%> I walked <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8762><s%> have they privily laid <S%H2934><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a snare <S%H6341><s%> for me.

I looked <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8685><s%> on my right hand <S%H3225><s%>, and beheld <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, but there was no man that would know <S%H5234><s%> <S%H8688><s%> me: refuge <S%H4498><s%> failed <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me; no man cared <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8802><s%> for my soul <S%H5315><s%>.

I cried <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thee, O YY <S%H3068><s%>: I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Thou art my refuge <S%H4268><s%> and my portion <S%H2506><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>.

Attend <S%H7181><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto my cry <S%H7440><s%>; for I am brought <S%H1809><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> low <S%H1809><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me from my persecutors <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; for they are stronger <S%H553><s%> <S%H8804><s%> than I.

Bring <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8685><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> out of prison <S%H4525><s%>, that I may praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8687><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>: the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall compass me about <S%H3803><s%> <S%H8686><s%>; for thou shalt deal bountifully <S%H1580><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with me.
